name: A Little Tractor in Action Free: Best 3D Free Driver Game for Kids
name_original: A Little Tractor in Action Free: Best 3D Free Driver Game for Kids
description:
Tractors are essential parts of our lives. They are the best vehicles for transporting animals and livestock from the farm to the distribution centers, so at the end of the day people gets their food, their supplies. They best drivers are special people, as tractors aren't common vehicles, they are different from cars on handling, and on driving behavior.
Maybe that's the reason, because kids love tractors. Let's summarize things, why it can be: they love animals, farms, vehicles, they love transport games, they love cartoons and they prefer all that in 3D.
So We deliver those kids the best tractor simulator game, where they can be tractor drivers with special farm vehicles. All those incorporated to a driver game in 3D, with cartoon style graphics and appearing like a car simulator.
As I told before tractors aren't common cars, they are farm vehicles. So we carefully modeled them in 3D, we added the game some animals, the best physics available to the kids who want to feel as real farm drivers. This simulator game then let kids to feel themselves directly on the farm, in the driver seat of a transport vehicle surrounded by a beautiful 3D cartoon environment transporting animals and other things. And this game is serious! I told ya!
Now maybe we can then solve the puzzle, why kids love tractors? For the 3D? No... For the transport? No... For the farm? Nooo... Because the tractors are huge and Red. Or Blue. Or Yellow.... That is the secret of the kids, that is the secret of the farm transport vehicles we give you in full 3D game using a driver simulator environment.
SO whoever you are, for your best be a kid again and play with this 3D farm simulator game! You'll not regret it!
Features
- Unique driving experience with alternate controls. Controls are switchable.
- Special challenges, as High Traffic, Crossroads, Moving Machinery, Roaming animals....
- You can level up in 5 different areas to earn extra profits and proof your driving skills
- Beautifully crafted 3D Cartoon environment
- Different tractors to drive with unique Settings for better driving experience
- Customizable gameplay with numerous upgrades
- Lots of different power-ups
